metadata.course_description: In the first course of the Deep Learning Specialization, you will study the foundational concept of neural networks and deep learning. By the end, you will be familiar with the significant technological trends driving the rise of deep learning; build, train, and apply fully connected deep neural networks; implement efficient (vectorized) neural networks; identify key parameters in a neural networkâ€™s architecture; and apply deep learning to your own applications. The Deep Learning Specialization is our foundational program that will help you understand the capabilities, challenges, and consequences of deep learning and prepare you to participate in the development of leading-edge AI technology. It provides a pathway for you to gain the knowledge and skills to apply machine learning to your work, level up your technical career, and take the definitive step in the world of AI.
metadata.prerequisites: Basic knowledge of Python and linear algebra.

lessons.lesson_description: In this lesson, you will learn the basics of neural networks, their history, and their applications. You will also understand the difference between traditional machine learning and deep learning, and why neural networks are so powerful.

This lesson introduces you to the architecture of a neural network and explains how a simple feedforward neural network is constructed. You will also learn about the activation functions and how they influence the learning process.
Learn about the forward and backward propagation processes, how gradients are calculated, and how the backpropagation algorithm is used to optimize the weights of a neural network.

lessons.lesson_title: Vectorization and Efficiency in Neural Networks
lessons.lesson_description: This lesson teaches you how to improve the efficiency of training a neural network using vectorized operations and discusses how to implement neural networks efficiently using popular deep learning frameworks.

lessons.lesson_title: Understanding Deep Learning and its Challenges
lessons.lesson_description: In this lesson, you will learn about deep learning, its challenges, and how deep neural networks differ from shallow networks. You will also gain an understanding of the key architectural choices in deep learning models.
You will study optimization techniques like gradient descent, stochastic gradient descent (SGD), and momentum to train neural networks more effectively.
This lesson focuses on techniques to prevent overfitting in neural networks, such as L2 regularization, dropout, and data augmentation.
Learn about hyperparameter tuning and how it can improve the performance of your neural network models. This includes selecting the right learning rate, batch size, and number of hidden layers.
Explore various real-world applications of neural networks, such as image recognition, speech recognition, and natural language processing (NLP).

lessons.lesson_title: Building a Neural Network from Scratch
lessons.lesson_description: In this final lesson, you will build a simple neural network from scratch using Python, applying all the concepts learned in the previous lessons.
